resources.string: \"An apple a day keep doctor away\"

string-array.name: quote
string-array.item: An apple a day keeps the doctor away, But if the doctor is cute forget the fruit.
Eight glass of water a day, can make your symptoms go away.
Anorexia is a disease not a fashion statement.
Early to bed, early to rise, keeps a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
Success begins with hard work. Happiness begins with good health.
